data.title: Netball Waitākere
data.meta_description: Netball Waitakere caters for over 600 Winter League teams and over 200 Summer League teams in the West Auckland and Waitākere region.
data.text:
Te Pai Centre

We have three function rooms for hire which are able to accommodate 10-1,000 plus people. The spaces can be adapted to suit all occasions, e.g. Product launches, Trade shows, Share holders meetings, Conferences, Wedding receptions and Anniversaries, Christmas parties, Birthday celebrations, Family reunions, Corporate training and Special occasions.

For more information head to http://www.tepaicentre.co.nz/

Large Covered Event & Sports Facilities

We also have three indoor courts that can be used for netball and other sporting events, large weddings to private functions, car and trade shows, fairs and exhibitions.

Other Benefits

Convenient, free off-street parking

Comfortable rooms with natural light

Climate controlled air-conditioning

Ample space for group sessions

Dance floor and open deck space

Centrally located (with easy access to the motorway)

Adjacent to the Lincoln Green Hotel for accommodation

Close to the Trust Stadium

We can provide quality catering to suit every occasion with onsite bar facilities.

Our spacious premises, excellent facilities and pleasant surroundings make us the ideal venue for your next fuction or event.
